## Plotly Graphics

```{r}
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, color = ~factor(cyl),
        size = ~wt, text = ~paste("Displacement: ", disp),
        type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
```
  
  
## Plotly Graphics

```{r}
fit <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars)
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, color = ~factor(cyl),
        size = ~wt, text = ~paste("Displacement: ", disp),
        type = "scatter", mode = "markers") %>%
add_trace(x = ~wt, y = fitted(fit), mode="lines", line=list(width=1))
```
